body_html: @dmitrievanthony Some bug has been introduced after 1.11 release. I will fix it soon. If you are using nightly build, you can comment out this line: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute/python/collective_all_reduce_strategy.py#L232. Anyway, my PR should be merged soon.

body: @dmitrievanthony Some bug has been introduced after 1.11 release. I will fix it soon. If you are using nightly build, you can comment out this line: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute/python/collective_all_reduce_strategy.py#L232. Anyway, my PR should be merged soon.
